title: Companies Pay for Their Role in the Opioid Crisis | Greta Thunberg
itunes:title: Companies Pay for Their Role in the Opioid Crisis | Greta Thunberg
description:
Corporations are punished for fueling America's opioid crisis, Lewis Black talks about the effects of screen time on kids, and activist Greta Thunberg stops by.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
